title: Pisces Zodiac Sign: Personality, Dates, Compatibility & More

steps.content: Pisces Season: February 18th-March 20th [1] X Research source Element: Water [2] X Research source Color: Aquamarine or Seafoam Green Pisces Symbol: Fish [3] X Research source Ruling Planet: Neptune & Jupiter [4] X Research source Celebrities: Rihanna, Justin Bieber, Simone Biles, Olivia Rodrigo, Elliot Page, Millie Bobbie Brown, and Steph Curry

steps.title: Pisces are the ethereal, inward-facing empaths of the zodiac.
steps.content: Pisces are the ethereal, inward-facing empaths of the zodiac. As the last sign, Pisces is thought to embody the lessons and struggles central to every other zodiac, making them the ultimate complex character. Beneath a calm, quirky exterior, a Pisces’ inner world is often turbulent. With a Pisces, always expect more than meets the eye. People often mistake this sign’s sensitivity for simplicity; being underestimated is like a Pisces birthright. But Pisces are perceptive, compassionate, and profound people. It may not be politics or the periodic table that they know by heart, but if a Pisces knows you, then they know what makes you tick, too. The Pisces in your life are probably lowkey psychic—but luckily, they use their power for good. Expect tight hugs, flower crowns, poetry readings, and the most tenderhearted person in your contact list. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022.

steps.title: Blurring the line between fantasy and reality is a Pisces’ second talent.
steps.content: Blurring the line between fantasy and reality is a Pisces’ second talent. When things get tough, they seek solace in daydreams. Because of this, Pisces is gifted in resilience. But a tenuous relationship to the real world can have its challenges, too. Because a Pisces is such a capable daydreamer, they may struggle to invest in earthly responsibilities. This compels them to create amazing art, find rich spiritual fulfillment, and buck suffocating societal norms—but it may also create difficulty in their work and relationships. [6] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022.

steps.title: Intuitive–Pisces hand the roadmap of their own psyche to partners.
steps.content: Intuitive–Pisces hand the roadmap of their own psyche to partners. These fish are emotionally literate and very generous with their gifts. When a Pisces loves you , they make your feelings their business. Expect emotional analyses, insightful opinions, and empathy for days. Plus, a Pisces partner knows to toss the tissue box before your first sniffle. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022.

steps.title: Inspiring–Pisces turn their partners into part-time visionaries.
steps.content: Inspiring–Pisces turn their partners into part-time visionaries. When hanging around such a powerful, creative spirit, you’re bound to pick up a thing or two. A Pisces will be their partner’s spiritual cheerleader—encouraging artistic projects, rich emotional exchanges, and a childlike imagination. Dating a Pisces is often a magical, transformative experience.

steps.title: Inconsistent–Pisces are existential crisis magnets, so love can be tough.
steps.content: Inconsistent–Pisces are existential crisis magnets, so love can be tough. Emotional ups and downs can define a Pisces' relationships if they’re not careful. Though never mean-spirited and only rarely aggressive, a Pisces definitely gets moody. With little warning, a Pisces may become distant or reclusive. This can stress out high-strung people, but with patience and time, a Pisces' partner will learn to navigate the ups and downs. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Inventive–A Pisces wants to bring your wildest fantasies to life.
steps.content: Inventive–A Pisces wants to bring your wildest fantasies to life. They are nonjudgmental, imaginative, and extremely generous people. So for anyone lucky enough to get between the sheets with a Pisces , you can expect the role-playing of your dreams.

steps.title: Get vulnerable.
steps.content: Get vulnerable. A Pisces' life is colored by emotional discovery and truth. A Pisces won’t feel connected if you’re closed off, and if you find heartfelt expressions silly, then they’ll find you silly. To draw a Pisces in, discuss the big stuff: childhood fears, complex feelings, artistic dreams, and the wonders of life. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Reader Poll: We asked 707 wikiHow readers what their biggest dealbreaker is as a Pisces and 62% of them said someone who lies. [Take Poll] Pisces value honesty, so be upfront with your feelings!

steps.title: Offer safety and stability.
steps.content: Offer safety and stability. Pisces are the ultimate free spirits, and that’s the way they like it. But in love, a Pisces craves dependability—someone who can bring balance into their life. For these sensitive souls, the world can be a tough place. To attract a Pisces , make them feel protected and secure: be their emotional rock, fix things when they break, and organize the plans.

steps.title: Take your time.
steps.content: Take your time. Pisces are devoted partners, but they won’t be in any hurry. This sign is sensitive to structure and responsibility, so they may be slow to agree to exclusivity. Trust that they’ll get there in their own time. Don’t pressure a Pisces, understand their reservations, and if you get impatient, avoid lashing out. If you need more help navigating romance with a Pisces, we’ve got you covered: [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Make a Pisces man miss you . Seduce a Pisces woman through text . Know if a Pisces man likes you . Know if a Pisces woman likes you .

steps.title: Taurus and Pisces
steps.content: Taurus and Pisces . When a Pisces and Taurus couple up, they’ll each feel they’ve found their missing piece. A Pisces craves stability, substance, and solid ground to keep themselves on track. A Taurus desires spontaneity, softness, and sentimentality to help them break out of dry routine. This relationship will be sweet and easy. Like yin and yang, Pisces and Taurus will nurture, inspire, and effortlessly complete one another. If super cute couples turn your stomach, then steer clear. These two are about as perfect as it gets.

steps.title: Cancer and Pisces
steps.content: Cancer and Pisces . Pisces and Cancer are the emotional sleuths of the zodiac. These two worry constantly about other people’s feelings with one simple goal in mind: becoming the ultimate shoulder to cry on. [11] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. When a Pisces and Cancer get together, they’ll experience relief. Finally, someone is willing to care for them like they care for everyone else. This love affair is filled with late-night chats, lots of cuddling, and a genuine, mutual understanding. This relationship is the definition of emotionally rich. If there were an award for Most Likely To Cry Over How Much They Love Each Other, Pisces and Cancer would crown each other co-victors (and, in all likelihood, shed a few tears in the process).

steps.title: Scorpio and Pisces
steps.content: Scorpio and Pisces . A Scorpio and Pisces will give each other exactly what they want—and a bit of what they really need, too. These two share a passion for emotional intensity and devotion. A Pisces and Scorpio could spend a week locked in a room with just one activity on the docket: divulging every last secret and dream between them. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. A Scorpio will feel an urge to protect their Pisces partner, and a Pisces will feel compelled to help a Scorpio find healthy perspectives. In each other, these two will find surprises, warmth, and major admiration. Once these two get a hold of each other, it’ll take a lot for them to let go. Who do you think makes the best soulmate for Pisces signs? Sound off in our "Which signs have soulmate compatibility with Pisces?" forum !

steps.title: Capricorn and Pisces
steps.content: Capricorn and Pisces . You two are like fire and ice. Capricorn can inspire Pisces to get organized, and Pisces can help a Cap loosen up. The effect you’ll have on one another will be extraordinary—but the jury’s out on whether or not those transformations will be all positive.

steps.title: Aquarius and Pisces
steps.content: Aquarius and Pisces . You two are the ultimate altruists. An Aquarius wants to save the world, whereas a Pisces wants to help their friends feel fulfilled. In love, you two will totally blossom; finding an equally generous heart will feel like coming home.

steps.title: Pisces and Pisces
steps.content: Pisces and Pisces . You two really get each other. Nothing can hold you back from happily co-inhabiting a fantasyland together. You two won’t bother with conventional engagements. Instead, you’ll enjoy heartfelt conversation, secret sharing, and artistic expression until the end of time.

steps.title: Aries and Pisces
steps.content: Aries and Pisces You’re the perfect dynamic duo. Aries loves to lead, and Pisces, you love to follow. You’ll get into all kinds of trouble together, and you’ll have a blast doing it. Though it’s not completely clear whether or not you two are good influences on each other, Aries and Pisces have an amazing time figuring it out.

steps.title: Gemini and Pisces
steps.content: Gemini and Pisces . You two are as open-minded as it gets. No idea will be too wacky, and no opinion will be too off the wall. Pisces and Gemini’s accepting natures will allow you both to feel completely safe with each other.

steps.title: Leo and Pisces
steps.content: Leo and Pisces . You two are the creative geniuses of the zodiac. When a Leo and Pisces get together, great art is sure to follow. You’ll inspire one another, celebrate each other’s work, and ultimately, help one another grow creatively.

steps.title: Virgo and Pisces
steps.content: Virgo and Pisces . You’re the embodiment of opposites attract. Virgo prefers analysis and strict boundaries in love. Pisces is all about intuition and freedom. In your heart of hearts though, you both want the same thing: a deep, loyal, long-lasting partnership.

steps.title: Libra and Pisces
steps.content: Libra and Pisces . You two are the zodiac’s grand romantics. No Disney tale has anything on a Libra and Pisces’ love story . You two know how to pull out all the stops in romance, and this’ll make you feel empowered, celebrated, and understood in your relationship.

steps.title: Sagittarius and Pisces.
steps.content: Sagittarius and Pisces. You two are the free spirits of the zodiac. Though a Pisces wants a serious love affair down the line, they’re sensitive to feeling limited in relationships. The same goes for the sunny, silly Sagittarius. You two can focus on having an amazing time together, and if things do get serious, that will speak volumes about the strength of your connection.
